helpCenter.title: Help Center
helpCenter.description: Find answers to your questions and learn how to get the most out of OCTA-GRAM
helpCenter.searchPlaceholder: Search for help articles, videos, and more...
helpCenter.gettingStartedDesc: Learn the basics of using OCTA-GRAM for your network monitoring needs.
helpCenter.networkManagementDesc: Learn how to effectively manage network devices and configurations.
helpCenter.qualityMonitoringDesc: Learn how to monitor and analyze network quality metrics.
helpCenter.aiAssistantDesc: Learn how to use the AI assistant for network analysis and optimization.
helpCenter.faq1: How do I add a new device to monitoring?
helpCenter.faq1Answer: To add a new device, navigate to the Network Management section, click on 'Add Device' and follow the on-screen instructions to configure the device details.
helpCenter.faq2: Can I export network analysis reports?
helpCenter.faq2Answer: Yes, you can export reports in various formats including PDF, CSV, and JSON. Go to the Reports section and use the Export button.
helpCenter.faq3: How often is the network data updated?
helpCenter.faq3Answer: By default, the data is updated every 30 seconds, but you can adjust this interval in the Settings page under Network Settings.
helpCenter.faq4: Can I use OCTA-GRAM with my MikroTik devices?
helpCenter.faq4Answer: Yes, OCTA-GRAM supports integration with MikroTik devices. You'll need to configure the device settings in the Network Management section.
helpCenter.faq5: How do I update my license?
helpCenter.faq5Answer: You can update your license by going to the Developer section and clicking on 'License Management'. Follow the instructions to enter your new license key.
helpCenter.gettingStartedVideoDesc: A quick overview of how to set up and start using OCTA-GRAM

helpCenter.contactSupport: If you couldn't find the answer you're looking for, our support team is here to help.
